title: Outdoors, Attractions, Lodging, Restaurants, Towns & Weddings - Basic Set of Information

fields.label: Driving Directions
fields.name: driving_directions_repeater
fields.instructions: Create multiple sets of driving directions by clicking on "Add Directions" below.

sub_fields.label: Step Title
sub_fields.name: step_title_text
sub_fields.instructions: Enter a title for this set of steps.

sub_fields.label: Steps
sub_fields.name: steps_repeater
sub_fields.instructions: To add multiple steps, click "Add Step" below.

fields.label: Summary
fields.name: summary_textarea
fields.instructions: Enter a summary up to 45 words (200 characters). Please try not to list out amenities in this summary as you can enter them one-by-one below.

fields.label: Short Description
fields.name: short_description_textarea
fields.instructions: Enter a short description up to 200 words (900 characters).

fields.label: Long Description
fields.name: long_description_textarea
fields.instructions: If desired, enter a longer description up to 2,000 words.

fields.label: Logo
fields.name: logo_file
fields.instructions: Upload a logo file. Formats allowed: PNG, GIF, SVG, EPS, PDF, AI, PSD, JPG

fields.label: Contact Email Address
fields.name: email_address_email
fields.instructions: This email address will be displayed publicly with the business location information.

fields.label: Social Media
fields.name: social_media_repeater
fields.instructions: Add social media website links by clicking "Add Social Media Links" below.

fields.label: Review Sites
fields.name: review_sites_repeater
fields.instructions: Add review website links by clicking "Add Review Sites" below.

fields.label: Business Listings
fields.name: business_listings_repeater
fields.instructions: Add business listing website links by clicking "Add Business Listings" below.

fields.label: Shopping Center
fields.name: shopping_center_true_false
fields.message: Yes, this business in a shopping center.
